name: Bond Tech Industries
description: Bond Tech manufactures adhesive glue inc
overview: With over 75 years of combined adhesive experience, Bond Tech is your source for Professional Advice, Quality Adhesives and Innovative Thinking.Our philosophy is simple; we will earn your trust by saying what we mean and doing what we say.By adopting this simple philosophy we have established tremendous, long standing relationships with our customers.They feels pride in being a customer-centric driven company. As existing customers have come to realize, Bond Tech always exceeds expectations to ensure that the customer is ALWAYS satisfied. We take great pride in this because we know that you have a choice when it comes to adhesive suppliers.
